title: Ambassador hosts Haider Ali for winning gold medal in Tokyo paralympics
content:
Tokyo Sep 3, (APP): Ambassador Imtiaz Ahmad hosted Discus Thrower Haider Ali who won Pakistan first Gold Medal in Tokyo Paralympics. He congratulated him for this remarkable achievement.
While commending Haider Ali for igniting the passion for discus throw in Pakistan, the Ambassador said, he indeed made Pakistan proud and his achievement would inspire many youngsters to start discus throwing in the country.
With constant hard work, dedication and desire to serve our country, Haidar Ali will surely bring more laurels to Pakistan in the coming years, said the ambassador.
The Ambassador presented Haider Ali with a certificate of appreciation and gift from the embassy.
Discus Thrower #HaiderAli while expressing his views at Embassy of Pakistan, Tokyo. pic.twitter.com/OJ6HA1xsZ0

Ambassador Imtiaz Ahmad hosted Discus Thrower #HaiderAli who won Pakistan first Gold Medal in Tokyo Paralympics. The Ambassador congratulated him for this remarkable achievement. pic.twitter.com/hNrH706kOt
In a telephonic conversation, @SMQureshiPTI congratulated #HaiderAli on his success in Tokyo Paralympics. He commended #HaiderAli's efforts and praised his dedication and hardwork that led to this remarkable milestone. pic.twitter.com/UhUEaY6HDa
